job_description:
Role: Sr. Java Developer with Microservices

Location: Remote/Canada

Duration: 6+Months

Job Description

Senior Java Developer with Backend with Strong Microservicece experience -Remote

Deeply passionate about learning and innovating using the latest technologies

Strong design skills for individual applications (solution architecture) and across applications (enterprise architecture)

7+ years of experience in object-oriented programming with expertise in languages such Java,

Must Have: Java, J2EE, Object-oriented design, Algorithms, Spring Boot, Microservices

Experience with Agile methodologies

Ability to produce quality results in an evolving and a fast-paced environment

Familiar with development tools such as Jenkins, Rundeck, SVN/Crucible/Jira, Git/Stash etc.

Experience with containers, Kubernetes/ Docker,

Let me know if you need any information.
